text: Brass Target is a 1978 American World War II action drama mystery thriller movie directed by John Hough and was based on 1974 novel The Algonquin Project by Frederick Nolan. It stars Sophia Loren, John Cassavetes, George Kennedy, Robert Vaughn, Patrick McGoohan, Bruce Davison, Edward Herrmann, Max von Sydow, Ed Bishop, Lee Montague, Bernard Horsfall, John Junkin, Heinz Bennent and Yulian Panich. It was distributed by Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer. ==Other websites== * * * * Category:1978 war movies Category:1978 thriller movies Category:American war movies Category:American action thriller movies Category:MGM movies Category:Movies directed by John Hough Category:Movies based on books Category:World War II movies Category:Movies set in the 1940s Category:Movies set in Germany Category:1970s English-language movies Category:1970s American drama movies Category:1970s American action movies Category:American heist movies Category:American drama thriller movies Category:1970s mystery movies Category:American mystery movies Category:Movies about Nazism Category:Movies set on trains Category:1978 crime drama movies Category:American crime drama movies Category:1970s American crime movies
